org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder

Class DBSelectTableModelStd

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder.DBSelectTableModelBase
        • org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder.DBSelectTableModelStd
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class DBSelectTableModelStd
extends DBSelectTableModelBase
    This class extends DBSelectTableModelBase and is used to enabled the user to indicate which items will be displayed, the boolean operator for the criteria and the criteria. It's JTable (view) is displayed in the lower panel of the "Standard" tab.
    See Also:
